item.title: MRK
item.description: score:-11 Chances: Merck & Co., Inc. is a health care company engaged in the provision of health solutions through prescription medicines, vaccines, biologic therapies, animal health, and consumer care products. The company operates in segments including Pharmaceutical, Animal Health, and Other, indicating diversified revenue streams.
